title: Application Error
body:
[Image](http://i.imgur.com/hzvFdM7.png)

So i got new pc, and when i transfer lol from brothers PC it shows me this message

replies.body:
There are two things I can think of right away that can be causing this.  To start, you'll want to [download League](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) and install it the normal way to make sure that everything is getting setup properly.  Trying to transfer another PC's files to end up making the files temporary or confusing the patcher and forcing to repair every time you open it.  

Since your PC is new, make sure your OS is also up to date so you have all necessary products to install without issue.  I also suggest going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS settings are configured to allow League to actually install and access game files.

I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KBiGGQVn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-01T17:32:09.084+0000)
>
> There are two things I can think of right away that can be causing this.  To start, you'll want to [download League](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) and install it the normal way to make sure that everything is getting setup properly.  Trying to transfer another PC's files to end up making the files temporary or confusing the patcher and forcing to repair every time you open it.  
> 
> Since your PC is new, make sure your OS is also up to date so you have all necessary products to install without issue.  I also suggest going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS settings are configured to allow League to actually install and access game files.
> 
> I hope that helps!

I'm gonna try this, thanks for advice.
